attributes.action: If you pull out of a house sale, you are liable for any costs incurred
attributes.additional_details: It is wrong that buyers can change their mind at any point leaving other parties to pick up legal costs,  searches,  reservation fees etc..
attributes.background: If a buyer pulls out of a house sale, they should be liable for any costs incurred by all parties involved.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Amend the home buying process in England to align with Scotland" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/739512
